item.title: File corruption issues
item.description: Dear users As reported last week, we have been dealing with an issue of apparent file corruption affecting a relatively small number of files in some volumes with paths beginning /gws/nopw/j04.

item.title: Update to high-performance data transfer services
item.description: Dear users, You will be aware that many JASMIN and CEDA services were redeployed from RHEL6 to CentOS7 operating systems last year.

item.title: Update COVID-19 impact on CEDA and JASMIN operations
item.description: At the beginning of the Covid-19 pandemic, we announced that all of our services should be considered at risk. Thankfully, our services have run largely as normal throughout the pandemic, but 10 months on, unfortunately, this ‘at risk’ status still stands.
